backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing per‑principal high scores and returning sorted leaderboard entries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with theme color variables and dark-mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component controlling game flow between start, play, game‑over, and leaderboard screens.
Authentication UI using Internet Identity with sign‑in/out handling and principal display.
frontend/src/features/game/gamePhysics.t: Pure physics utilities for runner movement, jumping, lane switching, obstacle updates, and difficulty scaling.
frontend/src/features/game/RunnerGame.ts: Canvas-based endless runner implementing physics, obstacle spawning, collision detection, and scoring.
frontend/src/features/game/types.ts: Type definitions for runner state, obstacles, and game configuration.
frontend/src/features/game/useGameLoop.t: Custom hook providing a requestAnimationFrame loop with delta‑time handling.
frontend/src/features/game/useRunnerCont: Defines a hook that listens for keyboard input to trigger jump and lane-switch actions when active.
frontend/src/features/leaderboard/Leader: Renders the leaderboard UI, fetching top scores and showing user status, loading, and error states.
frontend/src/features/leaderboard/querie: Provides React Query hooks for fetching best score, leaderboard data, and submitting new scores via the backend actor.
Displays the game-over UI, auto-submits the score for logged-in users, and shows submission status and actions.
frontend/src/features/ui/Hud.tsx: Shows the live score and, if logged in, the user's best score with loading and fallback states.
frontend/src/features/ui/StartScreen.tsx: Displays the start screen with game instructions and buttons to start the game or view the leaderboard.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity changes and invalidates dependent queries accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, exposing identity state, login, and logout functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for a light/dark theme and adds base styles including a pixelated canvas utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, plugins, and theme extensions tied to CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including features, requirements, pending requests, and versioned project state.
